long_description: Updated to be lighter and more breathable than ever, the Nathan HPL (Human Propulsion Laboratories) #020 Race hydration vest keeps you hydrated without slowing you down on long runs. Harness moves in harmony with your shoulder and upper-back movements, reducing wasted energy. Mesh shoulder straps and back panel channel air across your skin and wick moisture away to improve overall comfort. Insulated reservoir compartment zips open and provides quick, easy access to 2-liter reservoir (included). Bite Me(TM) valve is bent at a 90deg angle; can be easily shut off with a quick twist. Dual front pockets include one that's zippered to secure keys, ID or cash while the other stashes energy gels in a stretchy mesh pocket. The Nathan HPL #020 Race hydration vest features two zippered rear compartments that organize additional items.
short_description: Updated to be lighter and more breathable than ever, the Nathan HPL (Human Propulsion Laboratories) #020 Race hydration vest keeps you hydrated without slowing you down on long runs.
